text: Xinyang bing xingshan zhe [guoqu] suo chiguo de yinshi [ru jinjiu ling banbu qian yinguo jiu de xinshi, houshi tamen bu hui yin yinguo jiu er shoufa], dui tamen shi wu zui de, zhiyao tamen jingwei [an la, yuan bi jinwu], xinyang bing xingshan, ranhou, zhiyao tamen jingwei [an la] bing xinyang, zuihou, zhiyao tamen jingwei [an la] bing xingshan. An la xihuan xingshan zhe [zhu].
